title: I need to re design my company logo please guide me.
content:
Hi,

I need to re design my company logo please guide me.  
My company name is Al Nadeem Information technology

R.Gopakumar

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Alnadeem.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101122022/http:/typophile.com/files/Alnadeem.jpg) | 99.6 KB |
author: gopan

comments.content:
We might need a bit more information to go on there...  
What do you want guidance on? Obviously your ID, but all of it? A particular part?

--  
Rez +

to my eye, it looks nice as it is. except for the color of the arabic font. and it would be consistent if the pixel squares' colors were then changed to red, black and whatever new color is chosen for the arabic font.

of course, only you know why the need for a re-design. i am sure the group would need to know the terms of reference for the redesign for them to help more meaningfully.

Means is it good or shall i need to modify etc

R Gopakumar

my existing logo is [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/51916.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101122022/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/51916.jpg "http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/51916.jpg")

my organaisation comments is not visible and they want philosophy

R Gopakumar

i think you all see my old logo. now previous i posted my re work, i want to know my new logo is good or modify or delete to make new ...  
R Gopakumar

R Gopakumar

I canot insert images from my computer please help me.  
on HTTP error 407

R Gopakumar

I canot insert images from my computer please help me.  
on HTTP error 407

you mean like this

R Gopakumar
I like the logo in this thread. It probably doesn't need the drop shadow though.
I like it, but agree with aluminum (no need for the gray shadow). Also, I think the a's look a bit forced. Try to make the curves look more natural.
I prefer the existing logo isotype with the new logo's type. The swash in the new logo looks clichè and dated in my opinion.

I updated as per your comments

R Gopakumar
